title: Chat box is missing in spectator mode
body: my chat bar just doesnt exist in spectator mode

replies.body:
Hey there,

I know this might sound silly, have you tried pressing your enter (Return) key while in spectator mode?

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=Q4rAY7eF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-14T09:23:33.468+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> I know this might sound silly, have you tried pressing your enter (Return) key while in spectator mode?

yeah i have, i even pressed enter just to see if the chat bar was hiding, but it was only running shotcuts for spectator mode when i type.
